title: 820-00928 Touch Bar not powering on
message: This mac suffered oxidation in the u3900 region, I deoxidized it, replaced the damaged components, it worked perfectly. The customer decided to install macOS Monterrey and had Update Critical. I was able to update the macOS only when I unplugged the Touch Bar. Now the Touch Bar doesn't work at all, could you help me?

title: 820-00928 Touch Bar not powering on
message: I tested another Topcase with TouchBar and used the external monitor, but the Bar didn't work.

title: 820-00928 Touch Bar not powering on
message: Reinstall original macOS from Internet recovery...

title: 820-00928 Touch Bar not powering on
message: I used another Topcase, installed the system over the internet, but it shows a critical software update. I don't know what else to do, what's left is to inform the client that the Touch Bar will not work.

title: 820-00928 Touch Bar not powering on
message: You can try and reflow U4200. I have fixed a few on these just by doing that.
